scripts.name: Rem4rk's Torn Auction House Filters
scripts.description: A script that filters Auction House Items for you based on user-defined filters, includes a min/max price slider, a days remaining slider, buttons to hide items that the user has already bid on, or items they have been outbid on. Any auction listings that end within 1 hour will be highlighted with a gold outline to make auction sniping easier. The script also shows how many items are visible/hidden on the page, e.g. Visible: 10/12.
